EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Hayward, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I just wanted to follow up and see if you were still interested in scheduling a call to learn more about MBO? Please let me know. Thanks, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sara Conde Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2012 11:47 AM To: 'hayward.wilson@gmail.com' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Hayward , Thank you for the inquiry you submitted on linked in. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by go here. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
